name: New Harvest Media Inc.
tagline: Canada Web Design and Marketing Company
description:
New Harvest Media Inc. serves a growing family of small business and local government clients.
Our services include graphic design, motion graphics and interactive web database programming. Trust New Harvest Media Inc. to meet and exceed your expectations, whether your goal is simply to use your web site to promote your product or service, or to develop new ways of serving and communicating with your clients, partners and constituents.
